    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Called from LandingPage, getWorldData creates a socket connection with the server and assigns its messenger object that socket.

      • setLoginSalt

        public void setLoginSalt(java.lang.String loginNonce)
        Sets/initializes the loginSalt with the Hello loginNonce recieved upon opening the client.
        Parameters:
        loginNonce - loginNonce, or salt, to set locally

      • getLoginSalt

        public java.lang.String getLoginSalt()
        Getter for the login salt.
        Returns:
        the login salt associated with this client's Hello nonce response

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Sets the username of the client once a successful login has been acheived
        Parameters:
        username - username to set in the client

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Provides getter functionality for the username bound to the client.
        Returns:
        The client's username

      • getRegionChooser

        public javafx.application.Application getRegionChooser()
        Retrieves the region choose associated with the client
        Returns:
        the region chooser associated with the client

      • startSelection

        public void startSelection()
        This method is called from LandingPage upon a successful login by the user. It creates the regionChooser, and hands off user input to it.

      • sendLogin

        public void sendLogin(java.lang.String uname,
                      java.lang.String passwd)
        Called from LandingPage, an attempt by the user to log into the server. The password does not go over the network in plaintext.
        Parameters:
        uname - The entered username.
        passwd - The entered password.

      • sendRegionChoice

        public void sendRegionChoice(EnumRegion desiredRegion)
        Called from RegionChooser to indicate that the user is attempting to select a region.
        Parameters:
        desiredRegion - The region the user is trying to select.

      • draftCard

        public void draftCard(PolicyCard cardToBeDrafted)
        Requests that the server draft the specified card.
        Parameters:
        cardToBeDrafted - card to discard.

      • discard

        public void discard(EnumPolicy cardToDiscard)
        Requests that the server discard the specified card.
        Parameters:
        cardToDiscard - The card to discard.

      • getAssignedRegion

        public EnumRegion getAssignedRegion()
        Gets the region assigned to the client by the server based on the password file.
        Returns:
        The assigned region.

      • isLoginSuccessful

        public boolean isLoginSuccessful()
        Called by the LandingPage to determine whether the login attempt was successful. Needs to be synchronized to prevent race conditions between ClientListener and LandingPage.
        Returns:
        Whether the login was successful.

      • getAvailableRegions

        public java.util.ArrayList<EnumRegion> getAvailableRegions()
        Called by the RegionChooser to determine what regions have already been selected by other players in order to grey them out.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of AvailableRegions.

      • getTakenRegions

        public java.util.TreeMap<EnumRegion,java.lang.String> getTakenRegions()
        Gets the Regions taken mapped to the name of the player who has taken that region.
        Returns:
        A map of regions to players who have taken them.

      • setReceivedLoginAttempt

        public void setReceivedLoginAttempt(boolean receivedLoginAttempt)
        Sets the local instance bookkeeping receivedLoginAttempt
        Parameters:
        receivedLoginAttempt - the new value of reveicedLoginAttemp

      • didServerReceiveLogin

        public boolean didServerReceiveLogin()
        Determines if the server received a login
        Returns:
        true if server received login, else false

      • openConnection

        public boolean openConnection(java.lang.String host,
                              int portNumber)
        Opens up a socket connection with the server
        Parameters:
        host - The domain address of the host
        portNumber - the port number to open the socket with
        Returns:
        true if connection is open, else false
